      • shortestPath

        public void shortestPath(Router source)
                  throws mocknet.Control.QuitException
        Finds the shortest path to each of the other routers. Algorithm structure: initialize open list to all routers; sort list; visit each router as target of path from source; sort list after each visit
        Parameters:
        source - source of the path
        Throws:
        mocknet.Control.QuitException - if interrupted

      • shortestPath

        public void shortestPath(Router source,
                         Router target)
                  throws mocknet.Control.QuitException
        When this function is called, shortest path to target is available by following the backpointers, and its least cost will have been determined. This function visits each neighbor of target and adjusts that neighbor's cost if necessary, and setting the back pointer of the neighbor when the neighbor's cost improves. Finally, the algorithm traces the path back from target to source using backpointers, recording costs and adjusting forwarding tables.
        Parameters:
        source - path source
        target - path target
        Throws:
        mocknet.Control.QuitException - if interrupted

      • initLoop

        public java.util.Vector<Router> initLoop(Router source)
        Initializes algorithm loop. Adds all routers to open. Sort open in ascending order of cost.
        Parameters:
        source - path source
        Returns:
        sorted list of routers other than source

      • initRouters

        public void initRouters(Router source,
                        java.util.Vector<Router> open)
        Initializes the routers to begin the algorithm. Each router has initial cost of INFINITY (except source which is has initial cost of 0).
        Parameters:
        source - current path source
        open - open list to be initialized

      • sortOpen

        public void sortOpen(java.util.Vector<Router> open)
        Sorts open list in order of ascending cost
        Parameters:
        open - list to be sorted

        Parameters:
